values.label: Transcript ablation
values.description: A feature ablation whereby the deleted region includes a transcript feature

values.label: Splice acceptor variant
values.description: A splice variant that changes the 2 base region at the 3' end of an intron

values.label: Splice donor variant
values.description: A splice variant that changes the 2 base region at the 5' end of an intron

values.label: Stop gained
values.description: A sequence variant whereby at least one base of a codon is changed, resulting in a premature stop codon, leading to a shortened transcript

values.label: Frameshift variant
values.description: A sequence variant which causes a disruption of the translational reading frame, because the number of nucleotides inserted or deleted is not a multiple of three

values.label: Stop lost
values.description: A sequence variant where at least one base of the terminator codon (stop) is changed, resulting in an elongated transcript

values.label: Start lost
values.description: A codon variant that changes at least one base of the canonical start codon

values.label: Transcript amplification
values.description: A feature amplification of a region containing a transcript

values.label: Inframe insertion
values.description: An inframe non synonymous variant that inserts bases into in the coding sequence

values.label: Inframe deletion
values.description: An inframe non synonymous variant that deletes bases from the coding sequence

values.label: Missense variant
values.description: A sequence variant, that changes one or more bases, resulting in a different amino acid sequence but where the length is preserved

values.label: Protein altering variant
values.description: A sequence_variant which is predicted to change the protein encoded in the coding sequence

values.label: Splice region variant
values.description: A sequence variant in which a change has occurred within the region of the splice site, either within 1-3 bases of the exon or 3-8 bases of the intron

values.label: Incomplete terminal codon variant
values.description: A sequence variant where at least one base of the final codon of an incompletely annotated transcript is changed

values.label: Start retained variant
values.description: A sequence variant where at least one base in the start codon is changed, but the start remains

values.label: Stop retained variant
values.description: A sequence variant where at least one base in the terminator codon is changed, but the terminator remains

values.label: Synonymous variant
values.description: A sequence variant where there is no resulting change to the encoded amino acid

values.label: Coding sequence variant
values.description: A sequence variant that changes the coding sequence

values.label: Mature miRNA variant
values.description: A transcript variant located with the sequence of the mature miRNA

values.label: 5 prime UTR variant
values.description: A UTR variant of the 5' UTR

values.label: 3 prime UTR variant
values.description: A UTR variant of the 3' UTR

values.label: Non coding transcript exon variant
values.description: A sequence variant that changes non-coding exon sequence in a non-coding transcript

values.label: Intron variant
values.description: A transcript variant occurring within an intron

values.label: NMD transcript variant
values.description: A variant in a transcript that is the target of NMD

values.label: Non coding transcript variant
values.description: A transcript variant of a non coding RNA gene

values.label: Upstream gene variant
values.description: A sequence variant located 5' of a gene

values.label: Downstream gene variant
values.description: A sequence variant located 3' of a gene

values.label: TFBS ablation
values.description: A feature ablation whereby the deleted region includes a transcription factor binding site

values.label: TFBS amplification
values.description: A feature amplification of a region containing a transcription factor binding site

values.label: TF binding site variant
values.description: A sequence variant located within a transcription factor binding site

values.label: Regulatory region ablation
values.description: A feature ablation whereby the deleted region includes a regulatory region

values.label: Regulatory region amplification
values.description: A feature amplification of a region containing a regulatory region

values.label: Feature elongation
values.description: A sequence variant that causes the extension of a genomic feature, with regard to the reference sequence

values.label: Regulatory region variant
values.description: A sequence variant located within a regulatory region

values.label: Feature truncation
values.description: A sequence variant that causes the reduction of a genomic feature, with regard to the reference sequence

values.label: Intergenic variant
values.description: A sequence variant located in the intergenic region, between genes

sources.label: JGA SNP
sources.description: SNP-chip data in the NBDC Human Database/Japanese Genotype-phenotype Archive

sources.label: GEM-J WGA
sources.description: GEM Japan Whole Genome Aggregation (GEM-J WGA) Panel
